description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using LightningJS's Blits library. The component includes a template with text content that toggles when the 'enter' input is triggered, and manages internal state for favoriting functionality.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component that displays a button with toggleable text based on its favorited state.

methods.name: label
methods.description: Computed property that returns the appropriate label text based on whether the button is favorited.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Input handler that toggles the favorited state when Enter is pressed.
